subject: Philosophy
title: Nietzsche and the Death of God
description: A micro-lesson that makes Nietzsche and the Death of God usable.

hook.text: Nietzsche didn't celebrate God's death. He warned that without God, meaning itself was at risk.

buildup.text: For centuries, God provided the foundation for morality, truth, and purpose in Western culture.

discovery.text: Nietzsche saw that foundation crumbling. Science and reason had eroded faith, leaving a void.
